featured.text: As of May 1, 1995, all nationals of the following 15 countries are exempted from securing visas for entry into the Republic of China: U.S.A., Japan, Canada, Belgium, Luxembourg, Sweden, Holland, New Zealand, Australia, Austria, Germany, Britain, France, Spain, and Portugal.
A lover of tea since her childhood in Portugal, she brought tea-drinking to the English royal court and set a trend for the beverage in the seventeenth century.

definition.zh_def: 葡萄牙，位於歐洲西南部的國家，以其豐富的歷史和文化著稱。
definition.en_def: Portugal, a country located in southwestern Europe, known for its rich history and culture.
definition.example: I plan to visit Portugal next summer to explore its beautiful cities and beaches.
